properties.title: Maven Enforcer Plugin Rule dependOnAllProjects - Changes
properties.author: Mikko Koivunalho

release.description: Next minor release while moving towards version 1.0.0
release.action: Configure versions-maven-plugin for checking dependency updates.

release.description: Subsequent patch release while moving towards version 1.0.0
release.action: Rework Dependency Injection and add full rule unit test.
Move rule to com.github.mikkoi.maven.enforcer.rules package hierarchy to be closer to Apache package hierarchy.
Suppress Checkstyle error TypeName in integration tests only. ITF framework style issue.
